Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Animation

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.Animation
public class Animation extends Object
This class is a list of Textures that can be used to make animated Sprites.

    • setFrameDelay

      public void setFrameDelay(int frameDelay)
      This function sets the frame delay to the value passed in.
      Parameters:
      frameDelay - The amount of time in frames to wait before displaying the next frame.

    • setMicrosecondDelay

      public void setMicrosecondDelay(int microsecondDelay)
      This function sets the frame delay to the value passed in.
      Parameters:
      microsecondDelay - The amount of time in milliseconds to wait before displaying the next frame.
